heroes_description.name: Spider-Man
heroes_description.about: In Forest Hills, Queens, New York, Midtown High School student Peter Benjamin Parker is a science-whiz orphan living with his Uncle Ben and Aunt May. As depicted in Amazing Fantasy #15 (August 1962), he is bitten by a radioactive spider (erroneously classified as an insect in the panel) at a science exhibit and acquires the agility and proportionate strength of an arachnid.
heroes_description.creator: Created by writer-editor Stan Lee and writer-artist Steve Ditko.
